channel.title: CVE Feed for Moxa -- MXview Network Management Software
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Moxa -- MXview Network Management Software

item.title: CVE-2021-38452|2024-09-16T16:17:53.926Z -- moxa -- mxview%20network%20management%20software
item.description: A path traversal vulnerability in the Moxa MXview Network Management software Versions 3.x to 3.2.2 may allow an attacker to create or overwrite critical files used to execute code, such as programs or libraries.

item.title: CVE-2021-38458|2024-09-16T18:02:54.478Z -- moxa -- mxview%20network%20management%20software
item.description: A path traversal vulnerability in the Moxa MXview Network Management software Versions 3.x to 3.2.2 may allow an attacker to create or overwrite critical files used to execute code, such as programs or libraries.
